about_the_game:
Welcome to a new concept of 2D MMORPG, with unlimited progression, everything is tradeable and updates never stop! Trade your experience, or any item in the game, and leave the pay-to-win mentality behind. Updates are constantly being added, so you'll never be bored of the game.




You can customize your character with over 4100 hair style combinations, and choose any color you want. You can also gear up with hundreds of items, slay hundreds of monsters, and keep your looks always with thousands of hair style combinations. All of this free of charge, without having to pay anything. Not to mention all the features that are being developed!

Some of the features we plan to have at launch and others in the future are:
- Level up quickly in the game without losing the fun. The game progress is based on the items you have, the monsters you slay and the strategy you make managing your character.
- Trade anything in the game with a market inside the game and P2P trading.
- You can decide the price of any item in the game.
- The more friends you have in your party, the better rewards you get.
- The global ranking is only for active users, so no more top users that doesn't play anymore.
- We have an official discord, integrated to the game, where you can log in with your player.
- We make daily backups and anti-hack measures to keep your character safe.
- Powerful scalable server with no player limit.
- PvP Arena with victory-based ranking.
- Lots of monster hunts, dungeons, and over 200 items to collect and equip.
- To win, you need to play, the premium plans doesn't mess that much with the game progression or competitiveness.

In the future we plan to add even more features such as a fast growing system without losing the fun, mining with a progressive earnings system, a guild system, dragon and demon fights, and lots of different events and updates over time. And a lot more.

So come whitelist us today and experience a non-tedious progressing, full of things that will make you the new rift warrior!
